description: Better, smaller, faster - koa middleware for limit request by ip, store in-memory.
name: tomjs-koa-better-ratelimit

scripts.coveralls: npm run test-travis && cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require should
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should
